Package com.CZ2002.managers

Class OrderManager

java.lang.Object
com.CZ2002.managers.Manager<Order>
com.CZ2002.managers.OrderManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class OrderManager extends Manager<Order>
A Control class to execute the logics of Order - Create Read Update Destruction OrderManager will only keep track of active orders
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • createNewOrder

      public void createNewOrder(int tableNumber, int pax, Staff server)
      To Create new active Order object to add into the ArrayList of active orders
      Parameters:
      tableNumber - The Table Number ( 1 to 20 ) which diners are seated at
      pax - Number of diners seated at table
      server - Staff who is/was serving them

    • getOrder

      public Order getOrder(int tableNumber) throws NoSuchElementException
      Returns the Order made by the Table identified by tableNumber.
      Parameters:
      tableNumber - An integer representing the table number which the Order belongs to
      Returns:
      The Order based on tableNumber
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - Throws exception when Table is not found

    • addItemOrder

      public int addItemOrder(MenuItem menuItem, int tableNumber)
      Removes an Item from the Order based on table number
      Parameters:
      menuItem - The MenuItem Object that is to be deleted from the Order
      tableNumber - An integer representing the table number which the Order belongs to
      Returns:
      An Integer value to indicate if Item is successfully added

    • removeItemOrder

      public int removeItemOrder(MenuItem menuItem, int tableNumber)
      Adds an Item from the Order based on table number
      Parameters:
      menuItem - A MenuItem Object that is to be added to the Order
      tableNumber - An integer representing the table number which the Order belongs to
      Returns:
      An Integer value to indicate if an Item is successfully removed

    • deleteOrder

      public Order deleteOrder(int tableNumber)
      To delete the Order from the ArrayList of active Orders
      Parameters:
      tableNumber - An integer representing the table number which the Order belongs to
      Returns:
      The Order that was deleted

    • getOrderByIndex

      public Order getOrderByIndex(int index)
      Returns the Order instance found at index position index in entities.

      Returns:

    • setMembership

      public int setMembership(int tableNumber, int tableSetMembership)
      Setting membership status
      Parameters:
      tableNumber - An integer representing the table number which the Order belongs to
      tableSetMembership - An integer value denoting membership(1) or not (0)
      Returns:
      An Integer value to indicate if membership is successfully set
